sentences.english: I nearly · missed my flight.
sentences.russian: Я чуть не · опоздал на свой рейс.

sentences.english: A · large number of people came.
There was a · fatal accident on the highway.
I need to get my · driving licence renewed.
We had a huge · argument last night.
sentences.russian: Вчера вечером у нас была огромная · ссора.

sentences.english: Let's · have a chat sometime.
They're very much · in love.
I · broke my arm when I was ten.
sentences.russian: Я · сломал руку, когда мне было десять.

sentences.english: It's · important to be on time.
I'm working on the · final draft now.
sentences.russian: Сейчас я работаю над · окончательным вариантом.

sentences.english: It's absolutely · freezing cold today.
I have to · write an essay this weekend.
sentences.russian: Мне нужно · написать эссе на этих выходных.

sentences.english: That's a · bright idea!
I left my phone · in the car.
The wind is really · strong today.
That's the · key issue here.
Did you · take your medicine?
Have you · done your homework?
I · get on really well with my sister.
sentences.russian: Я очень хорошо · лажу со своей сестрой.

sentences.english: I don't want to · raise that subject now.
sentences.russian: Я не хочу · поднимать эту тему сейчас.

sentences.english: The mountains are so · high here.
Go · make your bed.
I try not to eat too much · fast food.
sentences.russian: Я стараюсь не есть много · фастфуда.

sentences.english: I couldn't see because of the · thick fog.
sentences.russian: Я ничего не видел из-за · густого тумана.

sentences.english: Can I · pay by credit card?
You should · go to the doctor.
They argued but then · made up.
Can you · set the table, please?
Don't · break the law.
We're · going on holiday next week.
sentences.russian: Мы · уезжаем в отпуск на следующей неделе.

sentences.english: We · booked a hotel room online.
sentences.russian: Мы · забронировали номер в отеле онлайн.

sentences.english: I had · great difficulty understanding him.
sentences.russian: Мне было · очень трудно его понять.

sentences.english: How many languages do you · speak?
I need to · make a presentation to the team.
sentences.russian: Мне нужно · сделать презентацию для команды.

sentences.english: I can · lend you some money.
sentences.russian: Я могу · одолжить тебе немного денег.

sentences.english: I got a really · cheap rate for the hotel.
sentences.russian: Я получил очень · дешевый тариф за отель.

sentences.english: The movie had a big · impact on her.
sentences.russian: Фильм оказал на нее большое · воздействие.

sentences.english: I · feel a sharp pain in my back.
sentences.russian: Я · чувствую острую боль в спине.

sentences.english: · High winds are expected tomorrow.
I · took a picture of the sunset.
I made a · serious mistake.
That bag · costs a fortune.
I've · lost touch with most of my school friends.
sentences.russian: Я · потерял связь с большинством школьных друзей.

sentences.english: I got there just · in time.
sentences.russian: Я добрался туда как раз · вовремя.

sentences.english: It's · necessary to have a passport.
They're · getting married in the summer.
My parents · got divorced when I was young.
sentences.russian: Мои родители · развелись, когда я был маленьким.

sentences.english: I need to · study hard for it.
sentences.russian: Мне нужно · усердно к нему готовиться.

sentences.english: The nurse · took my temperature.
I · have a bad cold.
I · work for a big company.
